title: BlackByte Ransomware Exploits VMware ESXi Flaw in Latest Attack Wave
description: The threat actors behind the BlackByte ransomware group have been observed likely exploiting a recently patched security flaw impacting VMware ESXi hypervisors, while also leveraging various vulnerable drivers to disarm security protections.
